```{r}
library(tidyverse)
Drake_Spotify_Data_2020 <- read_csv("Drake_Spotify_Data_2020.csv")

Drake_Spotify_charts = read.csv("New_Spspotify_chart_song_ranks.csv") %>% 
  mutate(artist_names = str_trim(artist_names), WeekDate = as.Date(WeekDate)) %>% 
   filter(artist_names == "Drake")


```

```{r}
duplicate_rows <- duplicated(Drake_Spotify_charts$track_name)

unique_combined_df <- Drake_Spotify_charts[!duplicate_rows, ]
unique_combined_df
```

Cant tell if the kaggle data set only contains songs drake did by him self


```{r}
merge(x=unique_combined_df, y =Drake_Spotify_Data_2020,by.x = "uri",by.y = "track_uri" )
```
